transcript: - I am so excited. I'm having a Mario Kart birthday party but it was, like, supposed to be a birthday party but now it has turned into something a little bit more serious. It has turned into a full-blown tournament. This is the first ever IJ Invitational Mario Kart Tournament. Now I don't really know how this is all gonna play out. I invited some friends. Everyone's getting very competitive now that they know that there's a trophy involved, so first things first, we need to do a little decorating. My sister's gonna come over and help, but I feel like I don't actually have that much decorating to do. I don't even know what is (plastic crinkles) ..in here but this is something I'm excited about is these chocolate coins. I looked for mushrooms, but the only type of mushrooms that I found online were psychedelics and actual real mushrooms. I'm not interested in that, but these chocolate coins are definitely something I'm interested in, so I guess those will do as some party favors. We also have a cake. You can kind of see it. We've got a little Mario and a little Luigi. (laughs) It looks so good. But first, we have some controllers charging, and I also need to update my Switch. I haven't played Mario Kart in a while so I gotta make sure I have all of the updated DLC. It's updating, it's happening, big news. (children yelling) Okay, so I came in first, but that doesn't mean anything because that's against the computers but against my friends who I know are really good at this game, it's not gonna stand up. Like it's all wrinkled, but it's what we're doing. (plastic crinkling) It's what we're doing. Where will the trophy go though? (dog bark echoes) Oh Jesus, sh- (Jenna laughs) - [Jenna] The trophy, probably next to the TV. Oh, no, no, no.
